metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5882 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Irssi 1.1.x before 1.1.2 has a use after free when hidden lines are expiredfrom the scroll buffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5882` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.8
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: irssi package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.8').
